home.parrafo-info: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Economics from Universidad Torcuato Di Tella with a minor in Mathematics and Statistics. Currently, I work as a Data Analyst at CENCOSUD. My professional career is focused on data analysis and collection, with a passion for econometrics and quantitative analysis.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I have a degree in Economics with a minor in mathematics and statistics from the Torcuato Di Tella University. I have learned different programming languages ​​​​oriented to data analysis.
In my professional journey I've had the chance to work across different sectors, exploring areas outside my main field of study. However, for the past year and a half, I've been working as a Data Analyst at CENCOSUD.

I consider myself a responsible, hardworking, and problem-solving kind of person. I'm great at teamwork, always approaching things with empathy and respect. I love continuous learning and have a knack for picking up new skills quickly and accurately.
